summary: Test suite for the Prefect agent covering work queue selection, flow run cancellation, and run submission, including default pool handling, missing pool creation, cancellation behavior, infrastructure interaction, priority ordering, error handling, and logging verification.
business_intent: Validate that the Prefect agent correctly manages work queues, cancels runs as expected, and integrates with execution infrastructure to reliably submit flow runs, thereby ensuring stable and predictable agent operation in production environments.
